ThingDef.label: pistol
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle Mark I
ThingDef.description: The Desert Eagle is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the United States together with IMI in Israel.

ThingDef.label: Colt Police Positive
ThingDef.description: The Colt Police Positive is a small-frame double-action revolver featuring a six-round cylinder, chambered for either .32 or .38 caliber cartridges. Designed primarily for sale to federal, state, or local law enforcement agencies, the Police Positive was introduced into the firearms market by the Colt's Manufacturing Company in 1907.\nCaliber: .32 S&W Long

ThingDef.label: Walther PPK
ThingDef.description: The Walther Polizeipistole Kriminalmodell, or Police Pistol Detective Model, is a blowback operated semi-automatic double action pistol.

ThingDef.label: Glock 18
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.

ThingDef.label: assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose military weapon for field or urban combat. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: AK-47
ThingDef.description: The AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated assault rifle, first developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov.

ThingDef.label: M4A1
ThingDef.description: The M4A1 carbine is a fully automatic variant of the basic M4 carbine intended for special operations use.

ThingDef.label: FAMAS-G2
ThingDef.description: The FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-Étienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service rifle of the French military.

ThingDef.label: L85A1
ThingDef.description: The L85 rifle variant of the SA80 family has been the standard issue service rifle of the British Armed Forces since 1987, replacing the L1A1 variant of the FN FAL.

ThingDef.label: pump shotgun
ThingDef.description: Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.

ThingDef.label: Mosbearg 500
ThingDef.description: Mossberg 500 is a series of pump-action shotguns manufactured by O.F. Mossberg and Sons

ThingDef.label: Saiga-12K-030
ThingDef.description: The Saiga-12K-030 is a rotating bolt gas operated fully automatic shotgun.

ThingDef.label: Daewoo USAS-12
ThingDef.description: The Daewoo Universal Sports Auto Shotgun is a fully automatic shotgun chambered for 12 guage rounds.

ThingDef.label: survival rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: M14
ThingDef.description: M14 rifle, officially the United States Rifle, 7.62 mm, M14,[5] is an American selective fire automatic rifle that fires 7.62x51mm NATOammunition. It gradually replaced the M1 Garand in U.S. Army service by 1961 and in U.S. Marine Corps service by 1965.

ThingDef.label: Barrett M107
ThingDef.description: Initially used to designate Barrett M95 bolt-action rifle. Designation changed to apply to a product improved M82A1M variant. Includes lengthened accessory rail, rear grip, and monopod socket.

ThingDef.label: sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.

ThingDef.label: Accuracy International (AWM)
ThingDef.description: The Accuracy International AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a bolt-action sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International designed for magnum rifle cartridge chamberings.

ThingDef.label: SVD
ThingDef.description: The Dragunov sniper rifle is a semi-automatic sniper/designated marksman rifle chambered in 7.62x54mmR and developed in the Soviet Union.

ThingDef.label: incendiary launcher
ThingDef.description: Incendiary bolt launcher. Starts fires.

ThingDef.label: RPG-7
ThingDef.description: The RPG-7 is a portable, unguided, shoulder-launched, anti-tank rocket-propelled grenade launcher.

ThingDef.label: force field net
ThingDef.description: Originally used by retiarii as a weapon to fight robot opponents in the glitterworld arenas, this high-tech weapon is also surprinsingly useful at catching fishes. Can also be used to catch humans...

ThingDef.label: PDW
ThingDef.description: A personal defense weapon is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.

ThingDef.label: heavy SMG
ThingDef.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

ThingDef.label: LMG
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun.

ThingDef.label: charge rifle
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot energy/projectile rifle.

ThingDef.label: minigun
ThingDef.description: A multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.

ThingDef.label: doomsday rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: A single-use rocket launcher for quick retribution.

ThingDef.label: triple rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires 3 projectiles in quick succession.
